issues.title: Inefficient Algorithm Complexity
issues.description: Nested loop implementation results in O(nÂ²) time complexity. This could cause performance issues with large datasets.
issues.suggestion: Use more efficient filtering approach or data structures like Map/Set for better performance

suggestions.description: Consider using Map for frequent lookups or Set for membership testing
suggestions.implementation: Create a lookup map from criteria for O(1) access instead of nested loops
